**Signature:**


## Properties

| Property                                                                       | Modifiers | Type                           | Description                                                                                                              |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| [includeLocalCopies?](./extensions.itemusedbyqueryprops.includelocalcopies.md) |           | boolean                        | _(Optional)_ Set to true to include local copies of the specified item in the response.                                  |
| [itemId](./extensions.itemusedbyqueryprops.itemid.md)                          |           | [ItemUri](./models.itemuri.md) | Identifies the item for which 'Used By' dependencies are being retrieved.                                                |
